body_html:
Thank you for the response. I installed nccl as below:

git clone https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl.git
cd nccl/
make CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda

sudo make install
sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/include/external/nccl_archive/src
sudo ln -s /usr/local/include/nccl.h /usr/local/include/external/nccl_archive/src/nccl.h

I added /usr/local/include to $PATH. But still i was getting the build error

I tried to install the .deb file you pointed to but got the error:

Selecting previously unselected package libnccl-dev.
(Reading database ... 288164 files and directories currently installed.)
Preparing to unpack libnccl-dev_1.3.4-1.cuda8.0_amd64.deb ...
Unpacking libnccl-dev (1.3.4-1+cuda8.0) ...
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of libnccl-dev:
libnccl-dev depends on libnccl1 (= 1.3.4-1+cuda8.0); however:
Version of libnccl1 on system is 1.2.3-1+cuda8.0.

dpkg: error processing package libnccl-dev (--install):
dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
Processing triggers for man-db (2.6.7.1-1ubuntu1) ...
Errors were encountered while processing:
libnccl-dev

Can you please let me know how to upgrade libnccl1?

body:
Thank you for the response. I installed nccl as below:
```
git clone https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl.git
cd nccl/
make CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda

sudo make install
sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/include/external/nccl_archive/src
sudo ln -s /usr/local/include/nccl.h /usr/local/include/external/nccl_archive/src/nccl.h
```

I added /usr/local/include to $PATH. But still i was getting the build error

I tried to install the .deb file you pointed to but got the error:

> Selecting previously unselected package libnccl-dev.
> (Reading database ... 288164 files and directories currently installed.)
> Preparing to unpack libnccl-dev_1.3.4-1.cuda8.0_amd64.deb ...
> Unpacking libnccl-dev (1.3.4-1+cuda8.0) ...
> dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of libnccl-dev:
>  libnccl-dev depends on libnccl1 (= 1.3.4-1+cuda8.0); however:
>   Version of libnccl1 on system is 1.2.3-1+cuda8.0.
> 
> dpkg: error processing package libnccl-dev (--install):
>  dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
> Processing triggers for man-db (2.6.7.1-1ubuntu1) ...
> Errors were encountered while processing:
>  libnccl-dev

Can you please let me know how to upgrade libnccl1?
